database.title: Database
database.subtitle: Database management
database.main: For more information on how to use phinx, its commands and its many options
database.list: List of migrations already carried out
database.seed: The Seed command runs all available seed classes. For more options and informations
database.migrate: The Migrate command performs all available migrations. For more options and information
database.rollback: The Rollback command is used to undo previous migrations performed by Phinx. For more options and information

dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to your CLIENTXCMS board
dashboard.isBetaOrAlpha: CLIENTXCMS is currently in %version%. Report a problem
dashboard.statistiquessub: Find the statistics of your host, whether it is the last registrations, the generated invoices and the active services, everything is there!

firewall.title: Firewall
firewall.subtitle: Identity Verification & Authorisation

firewall.confirmation: do you really want to disconnect from the firewall?

modules.title: Modules
modules.subtitle: Available module.
modules.empty: Unable to retrieve modules from the main website is currently unavailable. Please contact support
modules.warning: By deactivating this module, it is possible that some page no longer works due to certain features which will no longer be added by this module on the system. Our support will not be able to help you in the event of a problem of this type.

seo.head: HTML code to include in the head of all pages
seo.body: HTML code to include in the body of all pages

security.title: Authentication & Limitation
security.bannedemails: Banned emails or domains upon registration

captcha.title: Protect your forms and avoid bots by securing with HCaptcha or Recapcha

recapcha.title: Configure Google reCaptcha protection
recapcha.content: You can get reCaptcha keys on the Google reCaptcha website . You must use reCaptcha v2 invisible keys.

hcaptcha.title: Configure HCaptcha protection
hcaptcha.content: You can get reCaptcha keys on the HCaptcha website .

mail.mailfrom: E-mail address used to send e-mails

mail.content: This is a test of the ClientXCMS messaging system. You are ready to send emails

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: The reports below provide an analysis of the data held in the system.

staffs.title: Staff
staffs.subtitle: Manage staff with access to the administration.
staffs.ownertext: By enabling this option, the administrator could delete your own account without your permission. Give access to the right people

roles.title: Roles & Permission
roles.subtitle: Manager roles permission.
roles.info: When the group is owner it has all the permissions..

update.title: Update
update.subtitle: Manage system updates.
update.warning: Before updating CLIENTXCMS, you should make a backup of your site!
update.unknown: Cannot update CMS because master website is currently down or not available. Please contact support.
update.info: The version %version1% of CLIENTXCMS is available and you are on version %version2%. The latest version of CLIENTXCMS is ready for download.

bannedips.subtitle: Manage the banned IP addresses.
